name: Crazy Penguin Catapult 2
description:
Check out 20Q (TM) Sports and 20Q (TM) Celebrities, the followups to the smash hit 20Q (TM) Mind Reader!

MOST DOWNLOADED GAME
The original Crazy Penguin Catapult is the #1 reviewed game on the App Store with 4 Stars and winner of multiple awards from top gaming press,

Crazy Penguin Catapult is back! Get ready to launch even more penguins with all-new 50 levels, power-ups and more! Help the penguins continue the fight and save their friends from the pesky polar bears!

Invade the South in Antarctica and fight through polar bears by hurtling courageous penguins at them with your trusty catapult! Triumph in new levels and unlock crazy penguin power-ups including Grenade Penguin, Houdini Penguin, Bear Seeker Penguin and more! Didn't get a perfect score? Retry levels to get the highest score possible with endless replay value!

PREMIUM FEATURES:
- 50 brand new levels of penguin catapulting and sky-driving fun
- Unlock new Penguins power-ups including: Grenade Penguin and Drill Penguin
- Two great games in one:
(1) Campaign Mode: Original and charming story with over 200 penguins to launch
(2) Strategy Mode: Take over enemy bear territories in a turn-based struggle for domination
- Replay levels to get all of the stars and a perfect score
- Great controls - gently slide or tap your fingers on the touch screen to send your powered-up penguins flying or use the accelerometer to launch the penguins by doing a quick flick with your device
- Excellent music and sound effects

STILL NOT SURE? Try the Free Version.

MORE FUN FOR FREE
There is a Lite version for each D Choc game: 3D Tower Bloxx Deluxe, Chocolate Shop Frenzy, Diamond Islands, Tornado Mania, Tower Bloxx, Stunt Car Racing 99 Tracks, Mini Golf 99 Holes Theme Park, 24 Special Ops, Kamikaze Robots, Diamond Islands, Picto Play Plus, Pyramid Bloxx, Johnny Crash and 3D Brick Breaker Revolution.

You can currently find our classic pocket sized games for iPhone or iPod touch in a variety of categories including arcade, action, adventure, puzzle, sim, strategy, racing and more!

GREAT DEAL w/ THE PREMIUM VERSION
Download the Paid version for unlimited replay value packed with even more gameplay modes, levels, power-ups and special unlocks. Get the full experience!

FIND DC ON THE WEB
Get updated with Dig ital Chocolate's latest product, promos and game tips! Visit us on Facebook, MySpace, YouTube and Twitter! Find us FAST by searching for dchoc.
